thama sewa kalayedi metharam ansha gananawaka niratha thawath sanniwedakayaku mulu aasiyawema sitidayi mama nodanimi.1966 di ‚Äòrediyo silon‚Äô hi karmika shilpiyaku lesa sewayata bandunu hethema digu gamanakata pasu ada swadhina rupawahini sewaye sabhapathiwaraya lesa kirulu palanda siti. 1976 di 6 wani nobandi samuluwa padukka chandrika madhyasthanaya osse swadhina rupawahiniya haraha sajiwi wisthara wicharaya sinhalen kale ada ape samichiyata pamina sitina shilpi rosmand senarathnaya.

indrani perera chithrapata pasubim gayikawakada wuwaya. 1977 di suriya rekod lebalaya yatathe sidukala patigatha kirimak wana ‚Äúpodi malli‚Äù chithrapataye ‚Äúgini siluwaki githaya, ‚Äúdinum kanuwa‚Äù chithrapataya sandaha gayu ‚Äúirata akikaru‚Äù githaya, ‚Äúlassana kella‚Äù chithrapataya sandaha anjali gunathilaka samanga gayu ‚Äúkodi gaha yata‚Äù githaya, ‚Äúsadahatama oba mage‚Äù chithrapataye wiktar rathnayaka samanga gayu ‚Äúpem rasa wahena‚Äù githaya, ‚Äúsikuruliya‚Äù chithrapataye ‚Äúwasanthaye mal kakulayi‚Äù githaya in samaharaki. 70 dashakayedi aya suriya rekod lebalaya yatathe desmand da silwa saha pol pranandu samanga bayila githa patigatha kalaya. 1979 di aya sangitha nishpadakawarayeku wu jems samanga wiwaha wuwaya.
